events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivered.
Assigning this refund request to the customer support agent specialized in returns and money back cases.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have also attached a photo showing that I received a different product than what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the money back on your payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and helpful information. I appreciate the efficient handling of my refund request.
The refund has been successfully initiated on our end. Please contact us if you do not receive the amount in the next few days.
Just checking in to make sure you have received your refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now, and thank you for your patience and understanding throughout the refund process.
